name: Trouble in CubeTown
description:
There are three different types of characters: Cops, Robbers, and Citizens.

A random numer of police HQ, robber HQ, and citizen buildings are generated, with the corresponding types of AI being spawned in front of the buildings.

While the citizens randomly roam around the map, robbers chase the citizens and the cops (are supposed) to chase and eliminate the robbers before the robbers eliminate all the citizens.

NOTE: Game is unfinished and very buggy
